Articles.Content:
Hey everyone name is Twitchmafia! Been playing KSP for quite some time now, since about May. So not to long, I have gotten pretty good at it, landed on the MUN a couple times, with a single module and Apollo Style, And made two different space stations ! But I am far from Pro since I haven't even left the Kerbin System. Finally decided to come on the forum to look for tips and ideas, and to promote my youtube channel. >>>>>>>http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl80IiD6oN0uh7X1jAGViuw <<<<<<< I have a couple KSP Videos up there, but will be bringing a few more games to the channel as well!

Well everyone thanks for reading! Hope to make some friends and find some good tips and ideas.....and hope you guys check out my channel!

Thanks, Twitchmafia!
Welcome to the forum. A good way to call attention to your videos would be to post screenshots in the awesome pics thread, and/or threads in the ship sharing sub-forum. Have fun!
